Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the amount of time between notice of a project and a public hearing
Summary: Extends the amount of time between notice of a project and a public hearing.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to extending the amount of time between notice of a project and a public hearing
